items.name: Backpack
items.description: A leather bag with shoulder straps. Holds up to 400 coins.

items.name: Barrel
items.description: A wooden barrel that holds 40 gallons (320 pints).

items.name: Belt pouch
items.description: A leather pouch that holds up to 50 coins.

items.name: Bucket
items.description: Holds 40 pints (5 gallons).

items.name: Casket (iron, large)
items.description: A solid iron casket. A large casket can hold up to 800 coins.

items.name: Casket (iron, small)
items.description: A solid iron casket. A small casket can hold up to 250 coins.

items.name: Chest (wooden, large)
items.description: A large chest can hold 1,000 coins.

items.name: Chest (wooden, small)
items.description: A small chest can hold 300 coins.

items.name: Sack
items.description: A large, hessian sack that can hold 600 coins.

items.name: Scroll case
items.description: An oiled leather tube with a cap. Not completely watertight.

items.name: Vial (glass)
items.description: A glass vial that can hold up to half a pint of liquid.

items.name: Waterskin
items.description: A leather container that holds up to 2 pints of liquid. Weighs 5 coins when empty.

items.name: Candles (10)
items.description: Casts dim light in a 5′ radius and burns for 1 hour.

items.name: Lantern (hooded)
items.description: Shutters allow the light to be hidden and the flame protected. Burns one oil flask every 4 hours (24 Turns). A hooded lantern casts light in a 30′ radius.

items.name: Lantern (bullseye)
items.description: Shutters allow the light to be hidden and the flame protected. Burns one oil flask every 4 hours (24 Turns). A bullseye lantern casts light in a narrow beam, 60′ long and 20′ wide at the end.

items.name: Oil (flask)
items.description: A flask of oil fuels a lantern for four hours (24 Turns). Burning oil can also be used as a weapon, either by throwing it at enemies or by pooling it on the ground (covers a 3′ diameter area, burns for 1 Turn, 1d8 Damage to creatures passing through).

items.name: Tinder box
items.description: Used to light fires, including torches. In perilous situations, there is a 2-in-6 chance of success lighting a fire per Round.

items.name: Torches (3)
items.description: When lit, casts light in a 30′ radius and burns for 1 hour (6 Turns). Torches may also be used in combat.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: A heavy woollen blanket with a small pillow.

items.name: Cooking pots
items.description: Pots and pans for campfire cooking.

items.name: Firewood (bundle, 8 hours)
items.description: A bundle of dry wood. Burns for 8 hours.

items.name: Fishing rod and tackle
items.description: A rod, line, hook, and bait box.

items.name: Rations (preserved, 1 day)
items.description: Preserved rations last up to 2 months, or 1 week in dank conditions (e.g. fungal forest, dungeons).

items.name: Rations (fresh, 1 day)
items.description: Fresh rations last for 1 week, or 1 day in dank conditions.

items.name: Tent
items.description: Large enough for two people.

items.name: Holy symbol (gold)
items.description: Servants of the Pluritine Church must carry a holy symbol worn around the neck. A gold holy symbol grants a +1 bonus to the 2d6 roll which determines the success of the turning attempt and a +1 bonus to the 2d4 roll which determines the number of monsters affected.

items.name: Holy symbol (silver)
items.description: Servants of the Pluritine Church must carry a holy symbol worn around the neck. A silver holy symbol grants a +1 bonus to the 2d6 roll which determines the success of the turning attempt.

items.name: Holy symbol (wooden)
items.description: Servants of the Pluritine Church must carry a holy symbol worn around the neck.

items.name: Holy water (vial)
items.description: Water blessed by high-ranking clergy, stored in a special vial for use in religious rituals. Holy water inflicts damage on undead monsters. Loses its power if transferred from the blessed vials it is stored in.

items.name: Bell (miniature)
items.description: A 1″ brass bell.

items.name: Block and tackle
items.description: Used for lifting heavy objects. Reduces effective weight by 75%, but requires 4 times as much rope.

items.name: Caltrops (bag of 20)
items.description: Small metal spikes sufficient to cover a 5′ × 5′ area. Creatures moving through the area have a 2-in-6 chance of treading on a spike. Victims suffer a 50% Speed reduction for 24 hours (or until they receive magical healing).

items.name: Chain (10′ long)
items.description: A 10′ length of heavy, iron chain.

items.name: Chalk (10 sticks)
items.description: Useful for making markings on stone.

items.name: Chisel
items.description: Used with a hammer for chipping away stone.

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: An iron bar, 2–3′ long. Used for prying open doors, chest lids, etc.

items.name: Grappling hook
items.description: Made of iron, with 3–4 hooks and a ring to attach a rope.

items.name: Hammer (small)
items.description: Useful for hammering in iron spikes or tapping stonework.

items.name: Hammer (sledgehammer)
items.description: A big heavy hammer for breaking rock.

items.name: Ink (vial)
items.description: A vial of black ink. Coloured ink costs double. Sufficient for about 50 pages of writing.

items.name: Iron spikes (12)
items.description: May be used to wedge doors open or shut, anchor ropes, and many other purposes.

items.name: Lock
items.description: A basic iron lock with a key.

items.name: Magnifying glass
items.description: Used for studying fine details.

items.name: Manacles
items.description: Iron manacles with a chain. Used for restraining a creature's hands or feet.

items.name: Marbles (bag of 20)
items.description: A bag of small, colourful glass beads.

items.name: Mining pick
items.description: A strong pick for breaking rock.

items.name: Mirror (small)
items.description: Useful for looking around corners or for reflecting a monster's harmful gaze.

items.name: Musical instrument (stringed)
items.description: A stringed instrument (e.g. a lute or mandolin). The listed price is for an instrument of basic quality. Higher quality instruments can cost up to 10 times as much.

items.name: Musical instrument (wind)
items.description: A wind instrument (e.g. a flute or pipe). The listed price is for an instrument of basic quality. Higher quality instruments can cost up to 10 times as much.

items.name: Paper or parchment (2 sheets)
items.description: Approximately 1′-square sheets.

items.name: Pole (10′ long, wooden)
items.description: A 2″ thick wooden pole useful for poking and prodding suspicious items in a dungeon.

items.name: Quill
items.description: A large feather sharpened into a writing point.

items.name: Rope (50′ long)
items.description: Strong enough to hold the weight of three people and their equipment.

items.name: Rope ladder (25′ long)
items.description: Two ropes with looped rungs and a knot at the top to attach a grappling hook. Strong enough to hold the weight of three people and their equipment.

items.name: Saw
items.description: A carpenter's hand saw for cutting wood.

items.name: Shovel
items.description: For excavating earth.

items.name: Spell book (blank)
items.description: A hefty tome of vellum pages bound in leather, suitable for inscribing spells. A spell book can contain up to three spells.

items.name: Thieves' tools
items.description: A set of lock picking tools in a small case.

items.name: Twine (100′ ball)
items.description: A wound ball of thin cord or string. Can support up to 300 coins of weight.

items.name: Whistle
items.description: Useful for signalling or faking bird calls.

items.name: Clothes, common
items.description: Full sets of clothing to cover the whole body, including hose, tunic, shirt, belt, dress, etc.

items.name: Clothes, extravagant
items.description: Full sets of clothing to cover the whole body, including hose, tunic, shirt, belt, dress, etc.

items.name: Clothes, fine
items.description: Full sets of clothing to cover the whole body, including hose, tunic, shirt, belt, dress, etc.

items.name: Habit, friar's
items.description: Simple hessian tunic and cowl with a cord belt, worn by friars.

items.name: Robes, ritual
items.description: Fine quality robes with embroidered symbols. Often used by magicians.

items.name: Winter cloak
items.description: A thick, woollen traveller's cloak.

_metadata.extraction_note: Review and correct this data before importing
